contentList.title: Choose Your Melon
contentList.description: The first step is to choose your melon character. You can select from a variety of options, each with its unique abilities and traits.

contentList.title: Navigate Through Different Levels
contentList.description: Once you have chosen your melon, you will navigate through various levels to collect all the melons. Each level presents new challenges and obstacles, making the game more challenging as you progress.

contentList.title: Collect Melons
contentList.description: The primary objective of the game is to collect all the melons scattered across the different levels. Each melon you collect will increase your score and take you closer to completing the game.

contentList.title: Avoid Obstacles
contentList.description: The game presents various obstacles that you need to avoid to progress through the levels. Some of the obstacles include spikes, pits, and enemies.

contentList.title: Use Power-Ups
contentList.description: The game provides power-ups that players can use to overcome obstacles and make the game easier to play. Some of the power-ups include speed boosts, invincibility, and extra lives.
